creditline: Gift of Jill Bonovitz and Nancy Hellebrand in honor of their mother, Janet Fleisher
description: primitive style; stiff-looking small pink figure with brown hair wearing a blue loincloth-type garment lying on lavender, purple and blue horizontal elements on top of a red and brown stylized cradle; yellow ground with blue, purple and brown borders
provenance: Janet Fleisher Investment Corp., Philadelphia; given to MIA, 2016.
signed: on back in pencil: Eddie Arning | on back in black ink: Baby & Cradle
title: Child in Cradle
